williamBondiDesc: Professional comic book and graphic designer, pin up artist, illustrator and more since 1980.
whoIsWilliamBondiDesc: William Bondi has been drawing since 1980 in the workshop of Giovanni Romanini and Roberto Raviola (Magnus), collaborating on some series of comics with other authors as well. In 1991 he made ELTON COP as an author. It continues with Giorgio and Giacomo Cavedon of Ediperiodici until the closing of the publishing house. He collaborates with Talijancic, with Castelli and Filippucci and then begins his story as an illustrator of Pin Up. In the meantime he also dedicates himself to other realities as an illustrator as well as a creative for advertising.

testimonialsDesc: The object of art is not to reproduce reality, but to create a reality of the same intensity.
